title: GET_RESOURCE_METADATA
content:
0x964BAB1D// GetResourceMetadata
char* GET_RESOURCE_METADATA(char* resourceName, char* metadataKey, int index);Parameters:resourceName: The resource name.metadataKey: The key in the resource manifest.index: The value index, in a range from [0..GET_NUM_RESOURCE_METDATA-1].Gets the metadata value at a specified key/index from a resource's manifest.
See also: Resource manifest
codeBlocks:
// GetResourceMetadata
char* GET_RESOURCE_METADATA(char* resourceName, char* metadataKey, int index);
